ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Deal_V1', ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealSiteId__c,"15"), AND( NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "New"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Negotiating"), ISPICKVAL( EBH_Status__c, "Negotiating Amended"))), OR( LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = "00G", ISNULL(EBH_DealPrice__c), TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c) = "", ISBLANK(EBH_DealStartDate__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealStartTime__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealEndDate__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealEndTime__c), ISBLANK(EBH_SellerEmail__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c)), AND( ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealFormat__c, "Featured"), AND( NOT( ISBLANK(EBH_eBayItemID__c)), OR( LEN(EBH_eBayItemID__c) < 9, LEN(EBH_eBayItemID__c) > 16 , NOT( ISNUMBER(EBH_eBayItemID__c)))), (EBH_DealEndDate__c < EBH_DealStartDate__c), (EBH_SellerPrice__c < EBH_DealPrice__c ), AND( !Invalid_VAT_ID__c , EBH_Subsidy__c > 0, ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Planned")) ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter and validate all required information before the deal can be moved to Planned (Deal Price, Start/End Date/Time, Seller Email, eBay Item ID).
